title: Kantara (Hindi)
short_cast: Rishab Shetty, Kishore Kumar G., Achyuth Kumar, Sapthami Gowda, Manasi Sudhir, Prakash Tuminadu, Shanil Guru, Pramod Shetty, Deepak Rai Panaje, Ranjan
cast: Rishab Shetty, Kishore Kumar G., Achyuth Kumar, Sapthami Gowda, Manasi Sudhir, Prakash Tuminadu, Shanil Guru, Pramod Shetty, Deepak Rai Panaje, Ranjan
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: A fiery young man clashes with an unflinching forest officer in a south Indian village where spirituality, fate and folklore rule the lands.
